column1: Representative Exchange Rates for Selected Currencies
Last Updated: 17:49:53, US Eastern Standard Time
These representative exchange rates, which are reported to the Fund by the issuing
central bank, are expressed in terms of currency units per U.S. dollar, except for
1. which are in terms of U.S. dollars per currency unit, and those indicated by.
2. which are expressed in terms of currency units per SDR.
